index.in-progress: There is a project being created.

delete-account.title: Delete a Account
delete-account.description1: Are you sure you want to delete it?
delete-account.description2: The service is no longer available after you delete the account.

delete-feedback.title: Delete feedbacks
delete-feedback.description: Are you sure you want to delete all selected feedbacks?

delete-issue.title: Delete issues
delete-issue.description: Are you sure you want to delete all selected issues?

setting.title: Setting

sign-up-mgmt.domain-restriction-tooltip: You can set up the domain of the email that can be registered as a user.

setting.same-key: Input the same value as the key
setting.issue-tracker-mgmt.description:
UserFeedback issues and Issue Tracking System tickets can be linked and managed. 
Please enter the Issue Tracking System URL you are using.

field-mgmt.preview-caption: Preview is an example data to help you understand.
field-mgmt.preview-description: You can check it after selecting <preview>Preview</preview>.

delete-project.title: Delete Project
delete-project.description:
Deleting a project will delete all issue/feedback data.
Please enter the text below to proceed with the deletion.

delete-channel.title: Delete Channel
delete-channel.description:
Deleting a channel deletes all feedback data.
Please enter the text below to proceed with the deletion.

create-role.title: Create Role
create-role.description: Please enter a new Role Name.

edit-api-key.title: Edit API KEY
edit-api-key.description:
If you change the API KEY to inactive, the API for that KEY will not be available.
Please change the status to inactive only if you don't use API KEY.

delete-option.title: Delete Option
delete-option.description: It does not apply to options in previous feedback.

delete-role.title: Delete Role
delete-role.description:
Are you sure you want to delete Role?
Members with that Role will also disappear.

edit-member.title: Edit Member
edit-member.description:
Role varies from the menu accessible to functions available.
Please check the member and select the correct Role.

delete-member.title: Delete Member
delete-member.description: Are you sure you want to delete the Member?

create-project.title: Create Project

help.projectInfo: You can collect feedback on a project-by-project basis. Please register your Project information based on the product you want to manage your feedback on. (ex. Product Name)
help.roles: You can set permissions to access and use the Project.
help.members: You can register or manage members to participate in the Project.
help.apiKeys: Manage API Key information in the feedback collection API. If you collect feedback using API, please generate Key information.
help.issueTracker: UserFeedback feedback and Issue Tracking System can be linked and managed. Please enter your Issue Tracking System information.

create-project.error-member: User information that does not currently exist.
create-project.continue-channel-creation:
UserFeedback must be created up to the Channel before UserFeedback is available.
Would you like to continue creating a channel?

create-channel.title: Create Channel

help.channel-info: You can define the feedback fields that you want to collect through the Channel. Please register the Channel information considering the feedback path and personality. (ex. VOC, APP Reivew)
help.fields: Define the feedback fields that you want to collect with User Feedback according to the registered channel. Try pre-setting the fields you want to collect through the API or the fields you want to register directly from the ADMIN.
help.field-preview: You can preview what the fields you set up in Field Management will look like. Previews are not real because they are shown as arbitrary data.

create-channel.finish-channel-creation:
Everything is ready.
Start Using UserFeedback!

date.date-range-over-max-days: The inquiry period can only be entered up to {{maxDays}} days

text.warning-get-out:
Will you leave the process of creating a {{type}}?
Even if you leave, you can proceed later.

continue.title: Do you want to continue?
continue.description: There is a {{type}} currently being created. Do you want to continue? (If you do it from scratch, the existing information disappears.)
